en_example: Here is your book.
One plus one equals two.
Would you like to have some tea or coffee?

en: to be / to have / there is
hu_example: Van egy kutyám és három macskám.
en_example: I have a dog and three cats.
He’s already here.

en: must, need to, have to / to be needed
en_example: You must know this.
We still have some time.

hu_example: Egy ruhát és egy táskát vettem.
en_example: I bought a dress and a bag.
Csilla is taller than Linda.
My grandchildren are waiting for me.
I’ll ask him then.
He didn’t even look at me!
He might be right.
She’s tired because she has worked all day.
Everything’s going to be alright.

en: such, as, such a/an …, that kind of, so
en_example: She is so pretty!

hu_example: A barátom szerint mindenkit ki fognak rúgni.
en_example: According to my friend, everyone will be fired.

en: and, while, whereas / although, even though
hu_example: Megvette a jegyeket, pedig mondtam neki, hogy nem akarok menni.
en_example: He bought the tickets, although I told him I didn’t want to go.
This is my favourite song!

en: in this way, like this / thus, as a result, hence, therefore
en_example: Is it better like this?
We’ll be at home after six o’clock.

en: so (in that manner, in such a way)
en_example: So be it!
I have a big problem!
Stand up!
We’ll see!
We have two houses.
I don’t know.
I am very hungry!
Nothing ventured, nothing gained!
I’m feeling better now.
I need more time.

hu_example: Lenni, vagy nem lenni: az itt a kérdés.
en_example: To be, or not to be, that is the question.
Are you here?
Do you have Hungarian friends?
All that glitters is not gold.
It was love at first sight.

hu_example: Néha olvasnod kell a sorok között.
en_example: Sometimes you have to read between the lines.

hu_example: Az összetevő, amely minden ételt finomabbá tesz.
en_example: The one ingredient that makes every dish more delicious.
I’m not a baker but a pastry-cook.

en: there is no, there is not
en_example: I have no money.

en: other, different / someone else, something else
en_example: Let’s play something else!

hu_example: Ma a kutyámról, illetve a háziállataimról fogok beszélni.
en_example: Today, I’ll be talking about my dog, or rather my pets.

en: under, below, underneath / in, in / over the course of, during
en_example: There is nothing underneath the bed.
One of my friends is a soldier.
I should have talked to him.

en: that way, in that area, in that direction / on it
en_example: I don’t want to go that way.

en: such a/an …, this kind of / something like this
en_example: Such is life!

hu_example: Ez az állat kicsi és aranyos, azonban veszélyes is.
en_example: This animal is small and cute, however it is dangerous as well.

en: much, many, a lot of, lots of, plenty of
en_example: I have a lot of books.

en: meant, supposed / fitting, suitable, appropriate / real, true
en_example: This is no place for you.

en: by, per, through, by means of
hu_example: A kollégáim által javasolt új tervek jól hangzanak.
en_example: The new plans proposed by my colleagues sound good.

hu_example: Az édesanyám 30 éves volt, amikor megszülettem.
en_example: My mother was 30 years old when I was born.

hu_example: Ezt a könyvet gyerekek számára írtam.
en_example: I wrote this book for children.

hu_example: Láttam a munkatársaimat, a vezetőket, valamint az elnököt is.
en_example: I’ve seen my co-workers, the managers and the president as well.

en: because, for that reason, in order to…, therefore, so that…, the reason (for/why…) is…
en_example: He has come because I invited him.
I’d like to have a glass of wine.
She/he can sleep in her/his own bed again.
I am fine.

hu_example: Száz embert hívtunk meg a bulinkra.
en_example: We've invited 100 people to our party.

hu_example: Ez az a hely, ahol először találkoztunk.
en_example: This is the place where we met for the first time.
I’ll be there.

en: that, of / for / to that, it
en_example: Have you given candy to that child?
You can always count on me.

en: because of, owing to, for, for the sake of
en_example: They moved here because of the children.

hu_example: Van egy ház a folyó mellett.
en_example: There is a house by the river.
I grew up in a small village.

en: based on, by, on account of, because of, due to
hu_example: Ne ítélj meg egy könyvet a borítója alapján!
en_example: Don't judge a book by its cover!

en: in front of, ahead of, before, prior to
hu_example: Van egy fa a házunk előtt.
en_example: There is a tree in front of our house.
I spent the whole day cleaning.
She looks younger without make-up.

en: because of this, for this reason, therefore, for this
hu_example: Megsérült, ezért nem tudott dolgozni menni.
en_example: He was injured and therefore unable to go to work.

hu_example: Kérsz egy pohár vizet? Igen, köszönöm!
en_example: Would you like a glass of water? Yes, thanks!

hu_example: A férfi az út másik oldalán várt rá.
en_example: The man was waiting for her on the other side of the street.

hu_example: A személyes adataidra van szükségem: kor, nem, nemzetiség stb.
en_example: I need your personal details: age, sex, nationality, etc.
What’s your full name?
There are a few books on the shelf.

en: during, in the course of, over
hu_example: Sok emberrel találkozott hosszú élete során.
en_example: He’s met many people in the course of his long life.
What's the date today?
I know because I was there.

en: what?, what kind of?, what … like?, how?
en_example: How was your day?

en: all of it, all of them, each, everyone, all
en_example: They all have come.
I’d like to say something.

en: vice versa, then again, same to you
en_example: Same to you!

en: to stand, to suit, consist of
en_example: Stand up!

hu_example: Semmi rosszat nem tett, tehát nem ő a hibás.
en_example: He hasn’t done anything wrong, so he is not at fault.
I’d rather stay at home.
I have got three elder sisters.
Do you know how to swim?
How old are you?
Give me that plate!

hu_example: Szeretnék egy háziállatot. Például egy kutyát.
en_example: I’d like to have a pet. For example a dog.

hu_example: Ha szükséges, akkor holnap is tudok jönni.
en_example: If necessary, I can come tomorrow too.
Why don’t you go together to Paris?

en: might as well, even, just like
hu_example: Akár maradhatunk is még egy kicsit.
en_example: We might as well stay for a while.
I can't bear it any longer.
This doesn't make any sense.
He didn’t give me anything.
This is not the right moment.
I don’t like them.
No way! / Not on your life!
